suppress.vulnerabilityName: [sonatype-2020-1324] CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')

suppress.notes: Suppression for logback-classic and logback-core as we don't let third parties control our appenders. See https://logback.qos.ch/news.html#1.3.12 for further information. Can be removed when 1.4.12 is then used by spring. file name: logback-classic-1.4.11.jar

Suppression for logback-classic and logback-core as we don't let third parties control our appenders. See https://logback.qos.ch/news.html#1.3.12 for further information. Can be removed when 1.4.12 is then used by spring. file name: logback-core-1.4.11.jar
Suppression for checkstyle vulnerability that's being reported for ktlint library. file name: ktlint-cli-reporter-checkstyle-1.0.1.jar
Suppression for checkstyle vulnerability that's being reported for ktlint library. file name: ktlint-cli-reporter-checkstyle-1.0.1.jar
Suppress as false positive, see https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972. file name: jackson-databind-2.15.2.jar

Suppress as we haven't configured spring to handle JWEs. We don't encrypt our JWT, as they don't contain sensitive data so they are plain JWS instead. If we did choose to encrypt then we wouldn't use a symmetric algorithms like PBKDF2 since HMPPS Auth would be the only one needing to encrypt. file name: nimbus-jose-jwt-9.24.4.jar
